traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sorrowful Presence
traits.text: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.

multiAttack.text: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

attacks.name: Longbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At will: fog cloud, gust of wind, sleet storm

bonusActions.name: Fey Step
bonusActions.text: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Frigid Rebuke
reactions.text: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 11 (2d10) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.text: The korred has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

multiAttack.text: The korred makes two Greatclub or Rock attacks.

attacks.name: Greatclub

conditional.condition: the korred is on the ground

attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

attacks.name: Rock

conditional.condition: the korred is on the ground

attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The korred casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13): At will: commune with nature (as an action), meld into stone, stone shape once per day: Otto's irresistible dance

bonusActions.name: Command Hair
bonusActions.text: The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. The korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or become grappled by the rope (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes incapacitated.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The korred casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

multiAttack.text: The chimera makes one Ram attack, one Bite attack, and one Claw attack. It can replace the Claw attack with a use of Fire Breath if available.

attacks.name: Bite

conditional.condition: the chimera had Advantage on the attack roll

attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, or 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage if the chimera had Advantage on the attack roll.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

attacks.name: Ram
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

special.name: Fire Breath
special.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 31 (7d8) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

multiAttack.text: The tlincalli makes one Longsword or Spiked Chain attack and one Sting attack.

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

attacks.name: Spiked Chain
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

attacks.name: Sting
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Fiendish Blessing
traits.text: The AC of Isolde includes her Charisma bonus.

traits.name: Magic Resistance Aura
traits.text: While holding Nepenthe, Isolde creates an aura in a 10-foot radius around her. While this aura is active, Isolde and all creatures friendly to her in the aura have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: Isolde's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). Isolde can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: once per day: plane shift (self only) 3/day each: alter self, command, detect magic

multiAttack.text: Isolde makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

attacks.name: Nepenthe

conditional.condition: used with two hands to make a melee attack

attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft.., one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) slashing damage, or 12 (1d10 + 7) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a fiend or an undead, it takes an extra 11 (2d10) radiant damage.

attacks.name: Fire Ray
attacks.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.

special.name: Fiendish Charm
special.text: One humanoid Isolde can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys Isolde's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from Isolde or another creature or receives a suicidal command from Isolde, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Isolde's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Isolde's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). Isolde can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Fearsome Presence
traits.text: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened of the eladrin for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

attacks.name: Longbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

bonusActions.name: Fey Step
bonusActions.text: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.text: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

traits.name: Joyful Presence
traits.text: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

attacks.name: Longbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At will: Tasha's hideous laughter 1/day each: major image, suggestion

bonusActions.name: Fey Step
bonusActions.text: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

traits.name: Bloodied Fury
traits.text: While Bloodied, the quaggoth has Advantage on attack rolls.

multiAttack.text: The quaggoth makes two Claw attacks.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage, or 13 (3d6 + 3) Slashing damage if the quaggoth is Bloodied.
